articles.title: Google Chrome tests Microsoft Edge-like Read Aloud feature - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Google Chrome is set to enhance its user experience on the desktop by adding a "read aloud" function, currently available for testing in the Canary version. While its initial rollout might seem basic, it gets the job done.
